content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext.YellowTaxis (
	[vendorID] varchar(8000),
	[tpepPickupDate] date,
	[tpepDropoffDate] date,
	[passengerCount] int,
	[tripDistance] float,
	[puLocationId] varchar(8000),
	[doLocationId] varchar(8000),
	[rateCodeId] int,
	[storeAndFwdFlag] varchar(8000),
	[paymentType] varchar(8000),
	[fareAmount] float,
	[extra] float,
	[mtaTax] float,
	[improvementSurcharge] varchar(8000),
	[tipAmount] float,
	[tollsAmount] float,
	[totalAmount] float
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'raw/bigdata/YellowTaxis.parquet/',
	DATA_SOURCE = DataLakeSrc,
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat],
	REJECT_TYPE = VALUE,
	REJECT_VALUE = 0
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM ext.YellowTaxis
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext.ProcessedYellowTaxis
WITH 
(  
    DATA_SOURCE = DataLakeSrc,
    FILE_FORMAT = SynapseParquetFormat,
    LOCATION='/Facts/YellowTaxis.parquet'    
) 
AS
SELECT top 100
      PickupDate        = tpepPickupDate
    , DropDate          = tpepDropoffDate
    , Passengers        = passengerCount
    , TripDistance      = tripDistance
    , RateCodeId        = RatecodeID
    , PickupLocationId  = PULocationID
    , DropLocationId    = DOLocationID
    , PaymentTypeId     = paymentType
    , TotalAmount       = totalAmount    
FROM ext.YellowTaxis y
    INNER JOIN ext.TaxiZones z ON y.PULocationID = z.LocationID
WHERE tpepPickupDate >= '2019-06-01' 
    AND tpepPickupDate < '2019-07-01'
    AND passengerCount > 0
	AND z.ServiceZone = 'Yellow Zone';
